channel.title: Npc drops with certain items 317
channel.description:
Ok lets say I have a bronze defender in my inventory. How would I make it so that the npc would drop an iron defender or above only if I had the latest defender.. heres an example if that was confusing. Like the warriors guild. You go in with an addy defender and they drop rune defenders.. Nothing else below or above
Delta 317
Thanks for the help from this confusing question

pretty complicated, im not sure if i could do so myself but i belivie that you should Else it and it should work, there is a tut i think
